label: 下町
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: The downtown" or "low city" area of Edo/Tokyo and the site of most of the townspeople's homes and shops. Located roughly between the shogun's castle in the west and the Sumida River and bay on the east.［江戸、東京、墨田川、将軍］"
